mapper.sql: select t.id, t.username, t.nickname, t.avatar, t.email, t.mobile, t.remark, t.sort_index, t.is_enable, t.is_system, t.is_delete, createUser.id, createUser.nickname, t.create_time, lastUpdateUser.id, lastUpdateUser.nickname, t.last_update_time, deleteUser.id, deleteUser.nickname, t.delete_time from system_user t left join system_user createUser on t.create_user_id = createUser.id left join system_user lastUpdateUser on t.last_update_user_id = lastUpdateUser.id left join system_user deleteUser on t.delete_user_id = deleteUser.id
mapper.insert: insert into system_user(id, username, password, nickname, avatar, email, mobile, remark, create_user_id, create_time) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{remark}, #{createUser.id}, #{createTime})
